codexes.name: Accelerating Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Core Skills increase your Attack Speed by [15-25%] for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Abundant Energy
codexes.description: Crackling Energy has a [20-30%] chance to chain to an additional enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Echoes
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging enemies with Leap, Upheaval, or Whirlwind has up to a [40-50%] chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill. Can only happen once every 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancestral Force
codexes.description: Hammer of the Ancients quakes outwards, dealing [32-50%] of its damage to enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ancient Flame
codexes.description: While both bonuses from Esu's Ferocity Key Passive are active, your Attack Speed is increased by [40-50%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Anemia
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Direct damage against Bleeding enemies has up to a [20-30%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Armageddon
codexes.description: A hail of Meteorites falls during Inferno, dealing [X] Fire Damage on impact. Your Meteorites Immobilize enemies for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Arrow Storms
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Your Marksman Skills have up to a 10% chance to create an arrow storm at the enemy's location, dealing [X] Physical damage over 3 seconds. You can have up to 5 active arrow storms.

codexes.name: Aspect of Berserk Fury
codexes.description: You gain [X] Fury per second while Berserking.

codexes.name: Aspect of Berserk Ripping
codexes.description: Whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking, inflict [20-30%] of the Base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Binding Embers
codexes.description: Flame Shield lets you move unhindered through enemies. Enemies you move through while Flame Shield is active are Immobilized for [2.0-3.0] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Biting Cold
codexes.description: When you Freeze an enemy there is a [25-35%] chance they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Branching Volleys
codexes.description: Barrage's arrows have a [15-25%] chance to split into 2 arrows whenever they ricochet.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bul-Kathos
codexes.description: Leap creates an Earthquake that deals [X] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes, you gain [5-15%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Burning Rage
codexes.description:
While Berserking, you deal [X] Fire damage every second to
surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Bursting Bones
codexes.description: When a segment of Bone Prison is destroyed or expires, it deals [X] damage in an area around itself.

codexes.name: Aspect of Concentration
codexes.description: Your Mana Regeneration is increased by [10-20%] if you have not taken damage in the last 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Conflagration
codexes.description: While channeling lncinerate, your Burning damage is increased by [20-30%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Control
codexes.description: You deal [30-40%] more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Corruption
codexes.description: Your Imbuement Skill effects have [20-40%] increased potency against Vulnerable enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Cruel Sustenance
codexes.description: Explosions from the Victimize Key Passive Heal you for [X] Life for each enemy damaged, up to a maximum of [X] Life.

codexes.name: Aspect of Cyclonic Force
codexes.description: Cyclone Armor also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, Cyclone Armor will also be applied to all Nearby Allies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Decay
codexes.description: Each time the Shadowblight Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next Shadowblight's damage within 10 seconds by [20-40%] , stacking up to 5 times.

codexes.name: Aspect of Disobedience
codexes.description: You gain [0.25-0.50%] increased Armor for 4 seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to [25.00-50.00%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Echoing Fury
codexes.description: Your Shout Skills generate [2.0-4.0] Fury per second while active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Efficiency
codexes.description: Casting a Basic Skill reduces the Mana cost of your next Core Skill by [10-20%].

codexes.name: Aspect of Elusive Menace
codexes.description: While you have both bonuses from the Close Quarters Combat Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by [1-5%] whenever you're hit by a Close enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Empowering Reaper
codexes.description: Critical Strikes from Sever have a [10-20%] chance to spawn a pool of Blight under the target that deals [20-60%] bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Encircling Blades
codexes.description: Flurry damages enemies in a circle around you and deals [8-15%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Encroaching Wrath
codexes.description: After spending 100 Fury, your next Weapon Mastery Skills deals [82-100%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Engulfing Flames
codexes.description: While enemies are affected by more Damage Over Time than their total Life, you deal [30-40%] increased Burning damage to them.

codexes.name: Aspect of Explosive Mist
codexes.description: Blood Mist triggers Corpse Explosion on surrounding Corpses. When Blood Mist detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by [0.2-0.5] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Explosive Verve
codexes.description: Your Grenade Skills count as Trap Skills. Whenever you arm a Trap or drop Grenades, you gain [10-18%] increased Movement speed for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Exposed Flesh
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10% chance to generate [30-50] Essence when hitting a Vulnerable enemy with your Bone Skills.

codexes.name: Aspect of Fortune
codexes.description: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by [10-20%] while you have a Barrier active.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frenzied Dead
codexes.description: Each time one of your Summoning Minions damages an enemy, they gain [10-14%] Attack Speed for 3 seconds, up to [30-42%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Memories
codexes.description: The Avalanche Key Passive now applies to 1 additional cast.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Orbit
codexes.description: Frozen Orb stays in place after reaching its destination and explodes 2 additional times for [20-30%] of its damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Frozen Wake
codexes.description: While Ice Armor is active, you leave behind exploding Ice Spikes that deal [X] damage. Your Ice Spikes Chill enemies for 10%.

codexes.name: Aspect of Giant Strides
codexes.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Leap by [3-5] seconds per enemy hit, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Grasping Veins
codexes.description: Gain [10-20%] increased Critical Strike Chance for 6 seconds when you cast Corpse Tendrils. You deal [30-60%] bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by Corpse Tendrils.

codexes.name: Aspect of Grasping Whirlwind
codexes.description: Whirlwind periodically Pulls enemies to you.

codexes.name: Aspect of Hardened Bones
codexes.description: While your have 7 or more Minions, your Minions gain [15-20%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of Hungry Blood
codexes.description: When Blood Lance hits an enemy that is already lanced, it has a [10-20%] chance to fire a Blood Lance at a Nearby enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Imitated Imbuement
codexes.description: Your Shadow Clones also mimic the Imbuements applied to your Skills. Casting an Imbuement Skill grants your active Shadow Clone [8-16%] increased damage for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Inner Calm
codexes.description: Deal [5.0-10.0%] increased damage for each second you stand still, up to 30%.

codexes.name: Aspect of Lethal Dusk
codexes.description: Evading through an enemy infected by your Shadow Imbuement grants Stealth for 4 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants you [1-5%] Maximum Life on Kill for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Limitless Rage
codexes.description: Each point of Fury you generate while at Maximum Fury grants your next Core Skill [1-2%] increased damage, up to [15-30%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Mending Stone
codexes.description: The duration of Earthen Bulwark is increased by 6 seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with Earth Skills replenishes [X] of your active Earthen Bulwark's Barrier.

codexes.name: Aspect of Metamorphic Stone
codexes.description: Boulder is now a Core Skill and costs 60 Spirit to cast dealing [80-100%] of normal damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of Might
codexes.description: Basic Skills grant 20% Damage Reduction for [2.0-6.0] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Natural Balance
codexes.description:
Casting a Storm Skill grants your Earth Skills [30.0-45.0%] Critical Strike Damage for 4 seconds.

Casting an Earth Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of Storm Skills by [8.0-12.0%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Nature's Savagery
codexes.description: Werewolf Skills function as Storm Skills and Werebear Skills function as Earth Skills for the Nature's Fury Key Passive.

codexes.name: Aspect of Noxious Ice
codexes.description: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20% per second. You deal [10-25%] additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Numbing Wrath
codexes.description: Each point of Fury generated while at Maximum Fury grants [X] Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of of Bursting Venoms
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Poison Imbued Skills have up to a 10% chance to create a toxic pool that deals [X] Poisoning damage over 3 seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool, Poison Imbuement has no Cooldown and no Charge limit.

codexes.name: Aspect of Overwhelming Currents
codexes.description: Currents has a [10-20%] chance to cast an additional Shock Skill.

codexes.name: Aspect of Perpetual Stomping
codexes.description: Damaging an enemy with Kick or Ground Stomp resets Leap's Cooldown.

codexes.name: Aspect of Piercing Cold
codexes.description: Ice Shards pierce [3-4] times, dealing [25-20%] less damage per subsequent enemy hit.

codexes.name: Aspect of Plunging Darkness
codexes.description: Bone Prison spawns a pool of Blight that deals [50-100%] bonus damage over 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Potent Blood
codexes.description: While at full Life, Blood Orbs grant [10-20] Essence.

codexes.name: Aspect of Quickening Fog
codexes.description: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Dash's Cooldown is reduced by [0.25-0.35] seconds for each enemy Dazed this way, up to [0.75-1.05] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Quicksand
codexes.description: Damage from Earth Skills Slow enemies hit by [25-50%] for 5 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Rathma's Chosen
codexes.description: Whenever your Blood Skills Overpower you gain [20-50%] Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Reanimation
codexes.description: Your Skeletons gain increased damage while alive, up to [20-30%] after 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Repeating
codexes.description: Rapid Fire has a [25%] chance to ricochet to another target.

codexes.name: Aspect of Retaliation
codexes.description: Your Core Skills deal up to [20-40%] increased damage based on your amount of Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of Retribution
codexes.description: Distant enemies have a 8% chance to be Stunned for 2 seconds when they hit you. You deal [20-40%] increased damage to Stunned enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of Serration
codexes.description: The Ossified Essence Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your Bone Skills by 1% per Essence, up to [30-40%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Shared Misery
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a [30-50%] chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shattered Stars
codexes.description: Meteorites fall around Meteor, dealing [X] Fire damage in impact. Your Meteorites additionally Burn enemies they hit for [X] damage over [X] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Shielding Storm
codexes.description: Each time that Bone Storm damages an enemy, gain a Barrier equal to [2-5%] of your Base Life for 10 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Singed Extremities
codexes.description: After lmmobilize wears off, enemies are Slowed by [25-35%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Siphoned Victuals
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [10-20%] chance to drop a Healing Potion.

codexes.name: Aspect of Splintering Energy
codexes.description: Lightning Spear has a [11-20%] chance to spawn an additional Lightning Spear when you cast it.

codexes.name: Aspect of Static Cling
codexes.description: Your casts of Charged Bolts have a [15.0-25.0%] chance to be attracted to enemies and and last 300% longer.

codexes.name: Aspect of Stolen Vigor
codexes.description: Each stack of the Momentum Key Passive Heals you for [X] Life per second.

codexes.name: Aspect of Surprise
codexes.description: When your Evade or Shadow Step, you leave behind a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [X] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Swelling Curse
codexes.description: Bone Spirit deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to [15-25%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Synergy
codexes.description: Using an Agility Skill reduces the Cooldown of your next Subterfuge Skill by 20% . Using a Subterfuge Skill increases the damage of your next Agility Skill by [10-30%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of Tempering Blows
codexes.description: After swapping weapons 6 times, gain [X] Fortify.

codexes.name: Aspect of The Aftershock
codexes.description: Landslide's earth pillars each strike a second time and deal an additional [6-12%] bonus damage per hit.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Alpha
codexes.description: Your Wolf Companions are now Werewolf Companions. Werewolf Companions deal [75-100%] additional damage and can spread Rabies.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Blurred Beast
codexes.description: While dashing, Shred seeks out Neaby Poisoned enemies instantly dealing [60-90%] of the Poisoning damage to them.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Bounding Conduit
codexes.description: Gain [20-25%] Movement Speed for 3 seconds after Teleporting.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Calm Breeze
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Wind Shear has up to a [5-10%] chance to fully restore your Spirit.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Changeling's Debt
codexes.description: Damaging a Poisoned enemy with a Werebear Skill will instantly deal [120-150%] of the Poisoning damage and consume the Poisoning.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Crowded Sage
codexes.description: You Heal for [X] Life per second for each Close enemy, up to [X] Life per second.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Damned
codexes.description: You deal [30-40%] increased Shadow Damage to enemies afflicted by both Decrepify and Iron Maiden.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Dark Howl
codexes.description: Debilitating Roar is now a Werewolf Skill. In addition, Debilitating Roar will Immobilze Poisoned enemies for [2-4] seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Deflecting Barrier
codexes.description: While you have a Barrier active, there is a [7-13%] chance to ignore incoming direct damage from Distant enemies.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Dire Whirlwind
codexes.description: Whirlwind's Critical Strike Chance is increased by [5-10%] for each second it is channeled, up to [20-40%] .

codexes.name: Aspect of the Embalmer
codexes.description: Consuming a Corpse has a [20-30%] chance to spawn a Blood Orb.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Expectant
codexes.description: Attacking enemies with a Basic Skill increases the damage of your next Core Skill cast by [5-10%], up to 30%.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Frozen Tundra
codexes.description: While Deep Freeze is active, exploding Ice Spikes form in the area, dealing [X] Cold Damage. Your Ice Spikes have [25-35%] increased explosion radius.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Iron Warrior
codexes.description: Iron Skin grants Unstoppable, and [10-20%] Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Protector
codexes.description: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a Barrier absorbing up to [X] damage for 10 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 30 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Rampaging Werebeast
codexes.description: The duration of Grizzly Rage is increased by [1-5] seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while Grizzly Rage is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by 10% for the duration.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Relentless Armsmaster
codexes.description: Gain [20-36%] increased Fury Generation while all damage bonuses from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive are active.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Stampede
codexes.description: Gain 1 additional Companion. In addition, your Companion Skills deal [10-20%] bonus damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Tempest
codexes.description: Hurricane damage is increased by [7.0-15.0%] each second while active.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Trampled Earth
codexes.description: Trample now summons 6 Landslide pillars of earth during its duration that deal [70-80%] normal damage. Trample is now also a Nature Magic and Earth Skill.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Umbral
codexes.description: Restore [1-4] of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Unbroken Tether
codexes.description: Chain Lightning has a [25-35%] chance to chain 2 additional times.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Unsatiated
codexes.description: After killing an enemy with Shred, your next Werewolf Skill generates [20-30%] more Spirit and deals [20-30%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Unwavering
codexes.description: Taking direct damage has a [2-6%] chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your Defensive Skills.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Ursine Horror
codexes.description: Pulverize is now also an Earth Skill. After casting Pulverize, tectonic spikes continue to deal [X] damage over 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Void
codexes.description: Blight's defiled area, when spawned, Pulls in enemies around the affected area.

codexes.name: Aspect of the Wildrage
codexes.description: Your Companions gain the bonuses from the Bestial Rampage Key Passive.

codexes.name: Aspect of Three Curses
codexes.description: Meteor deals [35-50%] increased Critical Strike Damage against Healthy targets.

codexes.name: Aspect of Torment
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Bone Skills increase your Essence Regeneration by [20-30%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Ultimate Shadow
codexes.description:
Bone Storm and Blood Wave are also Darkness Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects: 
Enemies damaged by Bone Storm take [X] increased Shadow Damage over 2 seconds.
Blood Wave desecrates the ground it travels over, dealing [X] Shadow damage over 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Uncanny Treachery
codexes.description: Dealing direct damage to a Dazed Enemy with an Agility Skill grants Stealth for 4 seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants you [15-45%] Control Impaired Duration Reduction for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Aspect of Unrelenting Fury
codexes.description: Killing an enemy with a Core Skill refunds [10.0-20.0%] of its base Fury cost. Can only happen once per Skill cast.

codexes.name: Aspect of Unstable Imbuements
codexes.description: When casting an Imbuement Skill you trigger an Imbued explosion around yourself, applying the Imbuement effects and dealing [X] damage of the same type.

codexes.name: Aspect of Untimely Death
codexes.description: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond 100% grants you 0.5% bonus Overpower damage on your next Overpowering attack, up to a [20.0-60.0%] bonus.

codexes.name: Aspect of Volatile Shadows
codexes.description: When a Dark Shroud shadow would be removed you trigger an explosion around yourself that deals [X] Shadow damage.

codexes.name: Assimilation Aspect
codexes.description: You have 8% increased Dodge Chance versus enemies affected by Damage Over Time effects. When you Dodge, you gain [5-10] of your Primary Resource.

codexes.name: Balanced Aspect
codexes.description: Increases your Maximum Spirit by [30-50] and Spirit Generation by 20% while Grizzly Rage is active.

codexes.name: Ballistic Aspect
codexes.description: When you have Fortify your Earth Skills gain +2 Ranks.

codexes.name: Bear Clan Berserker's Aspect
codexes.description: Killing an enemy while Berserking has a 40% chance to grant [16-32%] increased Cooldown Reduction to your Brawling Skills for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Bladedancer's Aspect
codexes.description: Twisting Blades orbit for a short time after they return to you, dealing [10-15%] of Twisting Blades' return damage per hit. Based on the distance the blades returned, the orbit damage increases up to [20-30%] of the return damage.

codexes.name: Blast-Trapper's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills has up to a [30-50%] chance to make them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Blighted Aspect
codexes.description: You deal [50-120%] increased damage for 6 seconds after the Shadowblight Key Passive damages enemies 10 times.

codexes.name: Blood Getter's Aspect
codexes.description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by 2.

codexes.name: Blood Seeker's Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Lance deals [15-25%] increased damage to its primary target per lanced enemy.

codexes.name: Blood-bathed Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Surge's nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing [70-60%] less damage.

codexes.name: Blood-soaked Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Mist leaves a trail that lasts for 4 seconds and deals [X] Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while Blood Mist is active.

codexes.name: Bold Chieftain's Aspect
codexes.description: Whenever you cast a Shout Skill, its Cooldown is reduced by [2.7-5.4] seconds per Nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 12 seconds.

codexes.name: Brawler's Aspect
codexes.description: Enemies damaged by Kick or Charge will explode if they are killed within the next 2 seconds, dealing [X] damage to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Cadaverous Aspect
codexes.description: Consuming a Corpse increases the damage of your next Core Skill by [5-10%] , up to [25-50%] .

codexes.name: Charged Aspect
codexes.description: Collecting Crackling Energy increases your Movement Speed by [10-15%] for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Cheat's Aspect
codexes.description: You take [15.0-25.0%] less damage from Crowd Controlled enemies. Whenever a Crowd Controlled enemy deals direct damage to you, gain 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Coldbringer's Aspect
codexes.description: Every 10 seconds, your Cold Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals [X] Cold damage and continuously Chills enemies for 8% over 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Conceited Aspect
codexes.description: Deal [15-25%] increased damage while you have a Barrier active.

codexes.name: Crashstone Aspect
codexes.description: Earth Skills deal [40-50%] more Critical Strike Damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

codexes.name: Death Wish Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [X] Thorns while Berserking.

codexes.name: Devilish Aspect
codexes.description: After generating 100 Fury, your next Core Skill creates a Dust Devil that deals [X] damage to enemies behind the target.

codexes.name: Dire Wolf's Aspect
codexes.description: Grizzly Rage now Shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. As a Dire Werewolf you gain [15-25%] Movement Speed instead of Damage Reduction and [30-50%] Spirit cost reduction bonus. In addition, kills Heal you for 10% of your Maximum Life.

codexes.name: Dust Devil's Aspect
codexes.description: Whirlwind leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [X] damage to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Earthguard Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [15-25%] bonus amount to your next Earthen Bulwark for each enemy you Crowd Control up to a maximum of 100%.

codexes.name: Earthquake Aspect
codexes.description: Ground Stomp creates an Earthquake damaging enemies for [X] Physical Damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquake, you deal [5-15%] increased damage.

codexes.name: Earthstriker's Aspect
codexes.description: After swapping weapons 10 times, your next attack will Overpower and deal [30-50%] increased Overpower damage.

codexes.name: Edgemaster's Aspect
codexes.description: Skills deal up to [10-20%] increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.

codexes.name: Elementalist's Aspect
codexes.description: Core or Mastery Skills cast at or above 100 Mana gain a [20.0-40.0%] increased Critical Strike Chance.

codexes.name: Eluding Aspect
codexes.description: Becoming lnjured while Crowd Controlled grants you Unstoppable for 4 seconds. This effect has a [40-20] second Cooldown.

codexes.name: Encased Aspect
codexes.description: While Deep Freeze is active, you restore [10-20%] of your Maximum Life and Mana per second.

codexes.name: Energizing Aspect
codexes.description: Damaging an Elite enemy with a Basic Skill generates [3-7] Energy.

codexes.name: Enshrouding Aspect
codexes.description: Gain a free Dark Shroud shadow every 3 seconds when standing still. Each Dark Shroud shadow grants [2.0-4.0%] increased Damage Reduction.

codexes.name: Escape Artist's Aspect
codexes.description: Upon taking damage from surrounding enemies, you drop a Smoke Grenade and Dodge the next [2-7] attacks within 10 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 100 seconds.

codexes.name: Everliving Aspect
codexes.description: You take [20-25%] less damage from Crowd Controlled or Vulnerable enemies.

codexes.name: Exploiter's Aspect
codexes.description: You have 20% increased Crowd Control Duration. While enemies are Unstoppable, you deal [20-50%] increased damage to them.

codexes.name: Fastblood Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Orbs reduce your Ultimate Cooldown by [0.5-1.0] seconds.

codexes.name: Flamewalker's Aspect
codexes.description: Coming in contact with your Firewall grants you [15-25%] Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Flesh-Rending Aspect
codexes.description: After Decompose spawns a Corpse, gain [10-20] Essence.

codexes.name: Frostbitten Aspect
codexes.description: Chilled enemies hit by your Grenade Skills have a chance equal to double your Critical Strike Chance to be instantly Frozen for 2 seconds. You deal [10–25%] increased Critical Strike Damage against Frozen enemies.

codexes.name: Frostblitz Aspect
codexes.description: Frost Nova gains an additional Charge but the Cooldown per Charge is increased by [40-30%] .

codexes.name: Ghostwalker Aspect
codexes.description: While Unstoppable and for 4 seconds after, you gain [10-25%] increased Movement Speed and can move freely through enemies.

codexes.name: Glacial Aspect
codexes.description: When you cast Blizzard it will periodically spawn exploding Ice Spikes that deal [X] damage. Your Ice Spikes deal [20-30%] increased damage to enemies.

codexes.name: Gravitational Aspect
codexes.description: Ball Lightning orbits around you, but its damage is decreased by [20-10%] .

codexes.name: Hulking Aspect
codexes.description: Your Golem has a [1-4%] chance to reduce its active Cooldown by 2 seconds and a [0.5-2%] chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

codexes.name: Icy Alchemist's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Chilled or Frozen enemy with a Shadow Imbued Skill has up to a 75% chance to release an explosion that deals [X] Cold damage to the target and surround enemies, Chilling them for 15%.

codexes.name: Incendiary Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Burning Damage has up to a [5.0-10.0%] chance to restore 10 Mana.

codexes.name: Infiltrator's Aspect
codexes.description: Poison Trap no longer breaks Stealth and triggers no Cooldown or arm time while you are in Stealth. All Poision Traps activate when you exit Stealth and Poison Trap's Cooldown will be [5-8] seconds per trap placed.

codexes.name: Iron Blood Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [2.0-4.0%] Damage Reduction for each Nearby Bleeding enemy up to [10-20%] maximum.

codexes.name: Lightning Dancer's Aspect
codexes.description: Lightning Storm Critical Strikes spawn 3 Dancing Bolts that seek enemies in the area dealing [X] Lightning damage.

codexes.name: Luckbringer Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [12-20%] increased Lucky Hit Chance while all damage bonuses from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive are active.

codexes.name: Mage-Lord's Aspect
codexes.description: The Vyr's Mastery Key Passive's Damage Reduction is increased by [20-30%] for each Close enemy, up to [60-90%] .

codexes.name: Mangled Aspect
codexes.description: When you are struck as a Werebear you have a [20-30%] chance to gain 1 Spirit.

codexes.name: Mangler's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to a Vulnerable enemy has up to a [25-45%] chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Mighty Storm's Aspect
codexes.description: The Earthen Might Key Passive also applies to your Storm Skills.

codexes.name: Needleflare Aspect
codexes.description: Thorns damage dealt has a [20-40%] chance to deal damage to all enemies around you.

codexes.name: Nighthowler's Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Howl increases Critical Strike Chance by [5.0-10.0%]. In addition, Blood Howl also affects Nearby Companions and Players for 3 seconds.

codexes.name: Opportunist's Aspect
codexes.description: When you break Stealth with an attack, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades around your location that deal [X] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 0.50 seconds.

codexes.name: Osseous Gale Aspect
codexes.description: Bone Storm consumes up to 8 Corpses to increase its duration by up to [X] seconds.

codexes.name: Overcharged Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [10-20%] chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for 3 seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse [X] additional damage to surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Prodigy's Aspect
codexes.description: Using a Cooldown restores [15-25] Mana.

codexes.name: Protecting Aspect
codexes.description: When hit while not Healthy, a magical bubble is summoned around you for [3-5] seconds. While standing in the bubble players are Immune. Can only occur once every 90 seconds.

codexes.name: Rapid Aspect
codexes.description: Basic Skills gain [15-30%] Attack Speed.

codexes.name: Ravager's Aspect
codexes.description: Shadow Step has an additional Charge. Killing an enemy with Shadow Step refunds a Charge and increases the damage of Shadow Step by [1-6%] for 2 seconds, up to [5-30%] .

codexes.name: Ravenous Aspect
codexes.description: Killing a Vulnerable enemy grants you [50-70%] increased Energy Regeneration for 4 seconds.

codexes.name: Recharging Aspect
codexes.description: Each time Chain Lightning bounces off you, gain [4-6] Mana.

codexes.name: Relentless Berserker's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [22-40%] chance to extend the duration of Berserking by 1 second. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.

codexes.name: Requiem Aspect
codexes.description: You gain [3.0-5.0] Maximum Essence per active Minion.

codexes.name: Rotting Aspect
codexes.description: Decompose can chain up to 2 addtional targets. When Decompose spawns a Corpse, it has a [30-60%] chance to spawn a Corpse under all afflicted targets.

codexes.name: Runeworker's Conduit Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Storm Skills that you cast charge the air around you for [1.0-2.0] seconds causing a Lightning Bolt to periodically hit an enemy in the area for [X] Lightning damage. This duration can be extended by additional Critical Strikes.

codexes.name: Sacrificial Aspect
codexes.description: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by [15-25%] .

codexes.name: Seismic-shift Aspect
codexes.description: Earth Spike launches in a line and has a [1.5-2.5] second Cooldown.

codexes.name: Serpentine Aspect
codexes.description: You may have 1 additional Hydra active, but Hydra's duration is reduced by [30-20%] .

codexes.name: Shadowslicer Aspect
codexes.description: When you cast Dash, a Shadow Clone is spawned at your location that also casts Dash, dealing [25-35%] of the Base damage.

codexes.name: Shattered Aspect
codexes.description: Explosions from the Shatter Key Passive deal [30-40%] increased damage if enemies die while Frozen.

codexes.name: Shepherd's Aspect
codexes.description: Core Skills deal an additional [6.0-8.0%] damage for each active Companion.

codexes.name: Shockwave Aspect
codexes.description: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing [90-130%] of its damage to targets in the path.

codexes.name: Skinwalker's Aspect
codexes.description: When you use a Shapeshifting Skill that changes your form, gain [X] Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as Fortify.

codexes.name: Skullbreaker's Aspect
codexes.description: Stunning a Bleeding enemy deals [22-40%] of their total Bleeding amount to them as Physical damage.

codexes.name: Slaking Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: You have up to a [30-50%] chance to gain 20 Fury when Rend deals direct damage to at least one Bleeding enemy.

codexes.name: Smiting Aspect
codexes.description: You have [10-20%] increased Critical Strike Chance against Injured enemies. While you are Healthy, you gain [20-40%] increased Crowd Control Duration.

codexes.name: Snap Frozen Aspect
codexes.description: Each Chilled or Frozen enemy you Evade through grants you a Barrier that absorbs [X] damage for 5 seconds, absorbing up to a maximum of [X] damage.

codexes.name: Snowguard's Aspect
codexes.description: While within your own Blizzard, you take [10.0-15.0%] less damage.

codexes.name: Snowveiled Aspect
codexes.description: Casting Ice Armor makes you Unstoppable for [2.0-3.0] seconds.

codexes.name: Splintering Aspect
codexes.description: Bone Spear's primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first Vulnerable for [1.5-2.5] seconds. Bone Shards from Bone Spear deal [50-100%] bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies and pierce them.

codexes.name: Stable Aspect
codexes.description: While Unstable Currents is not active, your Shock Skills have a [5-10%] chance to trigger a free cast from it.

codexes.name: Starlight Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [10-20] of your Primary Resource for every 25% of your Life that you Heal.

codexes.name: Steadfast Berserker's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 35% chance to gain [X] Fortify whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking.

codexes.name: Storm Swell Aspect
codexes.description: You deal [11-20%] increased damage to Vulnerable enemies while you have a Barrier.

codexes.name: Stormchaser's Aspect
codexes.description: Tornado will seek up to [1-3] targets.

codexes.name: Stormclaw's Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes with Shred deal [20-30%] of the damage dealt as Lightning damage to the target and surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Stormshifter's Aspect
codexes.description: While Hurricane is active, gain +2 Ranks to your Shapeshifting Skills.

codexes.name: Symbiotic Aspect
codexes.description: When the Nature's Fury Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by [4-8] seconds.

codexes.name: Tidal Aspect
codexes.description: Blood Wave fires two additional waves, each dealing [50-60%] less damage then the previous.

codexes.name: Torturous Aspect
codexes.description: Enemies afflicted by your iron Maiden have a [15-25%] chance to be Stunned for 1 second when they deal direct damage.

codexes.name: Toxic Alchemist's Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Poisoned enemy with a Shadow Imbued Skill has up to a 75% chance to create a toxic explosion that applies [X] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to the target and surrounding enemies.

codexes.name: Trickshot Aspect
codexes.description: Whenever Penetrating Shot damages an enemy, 2 additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal [10-25%] of Penetrating Shot's Base damage and do not split.

codexes.name: Trickster's Aspect
codexes.description: Caltrops also throw a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [X] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 0.5 seconds.

codexes.name: Umbrous Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Marksman Skills have up to a [X%] chance to grant a free Dark Shroud shadow.

codexes.name: Unyielding Commander's Aspect
codexes.description: While Army of the Dead is active, your Minions gain [70-100%] Attack Speed and take 90% reduced damage.

codexes.name: Vengeful Aspect
codexes.description: Lucky Hit: Making an enemy Vulnerable has up to a [30-50%] chance to grant 3% increased Critical Strike Chance for 3 seconds, up to 9%.

codexes.name: Veteran Brawler's Aspect
codexes.description: Each time a Core Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next Charge or Leap deals [15-20%] increased damage, up to [225-300%] .

codexes.name: Vigorous Aspect
codexes.description: Gain [10.0-15.0%] Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.

codexes.name: Viscous Aspect
codexes.description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.

codexes.name: Weapon Master's Aspect
codexes.description: Your Weapon Mastery Skills have an additional Charge. Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Weapon Mastery Skill has up to a [32-50%] chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

codexes.name: Wind Striker Aspect
codexes.description: Critical Strikes grant [8.0-16.0%] Movement Speed for 1 second, up to 6 seconds.

codexes.name: Windlasher Aspect
codexes.description: Casting Double Swing twice within 1.5 seconds creates a Dust Devil that deals [X] damage to enemies behind the target.
